title: Homepage Hero Section Display
description: Verify the hero section on the homepage correctly displays Aditya Paswan's name, tagline, resume download button, and social media icons.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage
Check that Aditya Paswan's name and tagline are visible in the hero section
Verify resume download button is displayed and clickable
Confirm social media icons are visible and correctly linked

title: Resume Download Button Functionality
description: Validate that clicking the resume download button initiates download of the correct resume file.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage
Click on the resume download button in the hero section
Verify that the resume file download prompt is triggered with the correct file

title: Navigation Bar Sticky and Responsive Behavior
description: Ensure the navigation bar sticks to the top on scroll and collapses into a hamburger menu on mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Load the homepage on desktop viewport
Scroll page vertically
Verify the navigation bar remains visible and sticky at the top during scrolling
Resize browser viewport to mobile screen size width
Confirm navigation collapses into a hamburger menu icon
Click hamburger menu
Verify navigation links expand and are clickable

title: Projects Section Grid Display and Hover Effects
description: Verify that projects are displayed in a responsive grid and hovering over a project card reveals a GitHub link button.

steps.description: Navigate to Projects section from navigation bar
Check that project cards are displayed in a grid layout adapting to viewport size
Hover over a project card
Verify a button linking to the project's GitHub repository appears on hover
Click on GitHub link button
Confirm GitHub repository opens in a new tab

title: Skills Marquee Display and Responsiveness
description: Ensure the Skills Marquee section displays technical skills as scrolling badges or marquee and is responsive on all devices.

steps.description: Navigate to Skills section
Check technical skills appear as scrolling badges or marquee
Resize viewport to mobile and desktop sizes
Verify marquee or badges adapt and remain visible without layout breakage

title: Experience and Education Sections Content Verification
description: Verify Experience and Education sections display all relevant background, certifications, and education details correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Experience section
Confirm professional background entries are displayed with correct formatting
Navigate to Education section
Verify certifications and educational qualifications are visible and correct

title: Contact Form Submission with Mailto Fallback
description: Test that the contact form can be filled and submitted, and the mailto fallback links are functioning for visitor inquiries.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact section
Fill contact form fields with valid data
Submit the contact form
Check that form submission triggers successful send or fallback mailto link
Click mailto email address or phone contact link
Verify default mail client opens with correct recipient and subject

title: Dark Mode Theme Consistency
description: Ensure dark mode theme with deep slate/navy backgrounds and electric blue or vibrant purple accents is applied consistently across all pages and components.

steps.description: Enable dark mode theme (if toggle is present)
Verify background colors are deep slate or navy across components
Confirm accent colors use electric blue or vibrant purple appropriately
Check typography and spacing remain consistent and readable

title: Responsive Layout Across Different Screen Sizes
description: Verify that the entire portfolio website layout adapts seamlessly from mobile to tablet to desktop screen sizes.

steps.description: Load the site in mobile viewport
Validate content is readable and navigation usable without horizontal scroll
Resize viewport to tablet and desktop sizes
Confirm layout adjusts appropriately for each size with no overflow or content clipping

title: Animations Performance and Smoothness
description: Verify animations using Framer Motion run smoothly and do not cause performance degradation or jank across browsers.

steps.description: Navigate through multiple pages and sections triggering animations (e.g., hero intro, project hover effects)
Observe animations are smooth without frame drops or visible glitches
Confirm animations do not block user interactions or cause delays

title: Projects Data Accuracy and Completeness
description: Verify all projects displayed in the Projects Section match the data from constants.ts including project title, description, live demo, and GitHub links.

steps.description: Navigate to Projects section
Compare rendered project details with the source data in constants.ts
Validate all GitHub links correspond to the correct project repository

title: Navigation Flow to All Major Sections
description: Test that the sticky navigation bar links allow users to navigate correctly to About, Experience, Projects, Certifications, and Contact sections.

steps.description: Click on 'About' in navigation bar
Verify the view scrolls smoothly to the About section
Click on 'Experience' in navigation bar
Verify scroll to Experience section
Click on 'Projects' in navigation bar
Verify scroll to Projects section
Click on 'Certifications' in navigation bar
Verify scroll to Certifications section
Click on 'Contact' in navigation bar
Verify scroll to Contact section

title: Contact Form Validation with Invalid or Missing Data
description: Verify form validation handles invalid input or missing required fields gracefully with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact section
Attempt to submit contact form with empty required fields
Check for error messages indicating required fields are missing
Fill form with invalid email format and submit
Verify email validation error message is displayed
